record.dc:title: 134BN25 Ledbetter, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 9BN98, Indeterminate individual in poor condition about 5% complete. Scattered bone fragments. Complete cremation. Square 21L1. Direction West.
record.wpa:narrative: This was a cremation in a char-lined pit. In this case the charcoal was identifiable - bits of charred wood and hickory nuts were found.
